page.title: 01Steeple Claydon-an overview
page.content: The block has rich{agricultural land,mainly growing crops.The village of Steeple Claydon dominates the area.It is on the side of a hill on the summit of which is a church with the{steeple}of its name visible for miles around . The village is large and continues to grow. Cutting the block diagonally from southwest to northeast is the{railway line linking Oxford and Bletchley.This has no passenger facilities,carrying mainly ballast and the occasional empty passenger train being redeployed. The village is off the main road so there is{little,casual through {traffic.
